txt.en: Sharp-eyed Balin son of Fundin came to Moria years ago and likely camped near the Twenty-first Hall.

You have discovered a camp once inhabited by Balin son of Fundin when he led his own expedition into Moria.\n\nIt is completely overrun with vermin, but perhaps there are artifacts to be uncovered that lie nearby.

Balin's Camp can be found west of The Deep Crossroad, north of Khurjezer, which is east of the Twenty-first Hall.\n\nYou should search Balin's camp for relics of the expedition there and examine the camp's remnants thoroughly.
You have cleared Balin's Camp of the worst of its infestation, and can now investigate for any relics or items of interest.
Insects and other various enemies can be found in Balin's Camp in Nud-melek.\n\nYou should clear Balin's Camp of enemy creatures.
You have cleared Balin's Camp of the worst of its infestation, and can now investigate for any relics or items of interest.

'Did you know that Balin was known for having exceptionally sharp vision? Even when he was nearly the oldest dwarf in their party, Thorin used him as a look-out!\n\n'His camp? If I knew where it was, I'd find it myself! All I can guess is that it might be somewhere not far from the Chamber of Mazarbul.'
